intro: Psychotria sodiroi, commonly known as the Amazonian Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly the Amazon rainforest. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale pink flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the undergrowth of dense forests. Psychotria sodiroi is also noted for its potential ethnobotanical uses among indigenous communities.
